tool_description: The Integrated Taxonomic Information System provides taxonomic and nomenclatural data.
title: Integrated Taxonomic Information System API

api_list.name: search_for_any_match
api_list.description: Returns matches by comparing the search key to ITIS names and TSNs.

api_list.name: search_by_common_name
api_list.description: Finds matches by comparing the search key to the ITIS common names.

api_list.name: search_by_common_name_begins_with
api_list.description: Returns matches by comparing the search key to the beginning of ITIS common names.

required_parameters.name: srchKey
required_parameters.description: The search key that begins with.

api_list.name: search_by_common_name_ends_with
api_list.description: Returns matches by comparing the search key to the end of ITIS common names.

required_parameters.name: srchKey
required_parameters.description: The search key that ends with.

api_list.name: search_by_scientific_name
api_list.description: Returns matches by comparing the search key to the ITIS full Scientific Names.

api_list.name: get_itis_terms
api_list.description: Gets a list of ITIS Terms from a common or scientific name match.

required_parameters.name: srchKey
required_parameters.description: The search key for the ITIS terms.

api_list.name: get_itis_terms_from_common_name
api_list.description: Gets a list of ITIS Terms from a common name match.

required_parameters.name: srchKey
required_parameters.description: The common name for the ITIS terms.

api_list.name: get_itis_terms_from_scientific_name
api_list.description: Gets a list of ITIS Terms from a scientific name match.

required_parameters.name: srchKey
required_parameters.description: The scientific name for the ITIS terms.

api_list.name: get_tsn_by_vernacular_language
api_list.description: Provides a listing of TSNs with vernaculars entered in the requested language.
